code: const compareContent=()=>{const docTokens=tokenize(docText);const siteTokens=tokenize(siteText);const results=[];let i=0;let j=0;while(i<docTokens.length||j<siteTokens.length){const docWord=docTokens[i];const siteWord=siteTokens[j];if(docWord!==undefined&&siteWord!==undefined&&docWord.toLowerCase()===siteWord.toLowerCase()){results.push({left:docWord,right:siteWord,status:"matched"});i++;j++;}else{if(docWord!==undefined){results.push({left:docWord,right:"",status:"missing"});i++;}if(siteWord!==undefined){results.push({left:"",right:siteWord,status:"extra"});j++;}}}setResults(results);};
